name: Frosthold Town
description: A hardy northern town built to withstand the harsh arctic winds. Stone buildings with thick walls and small windows cluster around a central square dominated by a massive bonfire that never goes out.

center.name: Hearth Square
center.description: The town center is dominated by the Great Hearth, a massive stone fire pit that provides warmth and light. Fur-clad residents gather here to trade news and warm themselves.

buildings.name: The Frozen Mug Tavern
buildings.description: A warm tavern serving strong ales and hearty stews to ward off the northern cold.

buildings.name: Northern Furs Trading Post
buildings.description: A shop specializing in warm clothing and cold-weather gear.

buildings.name: Town Hall
buildings.description: The administrative center where the town elder holds court.

south.name: Southern Gate
south.description: The southern entrance to town, where travelers arrive from warmer lands. Guard towers flank a sturdy gate built to keep out both bandits and arctic beasts.

buildings.name: Guard House
buildings.description: A fortified building where the town guard maintains watch.
